Articles.Content:
ok here are the symptoms witch i will try to describe as best i can

Starting a new Career in KSP (lots of mods) everything is going fine until a certain point! (what exactly and when i don't know i provided the logs,saves,and screenshot at the moment this started to happen)

the annoyance is this, when entering Map view and time warping 50x (4 green arrows) everything is moving choppy (stuttering), everything Below or Above 50x Warp the stuttering goes away and everything goes back normal,Starting a new Career everything is fine again

What i did to find the cause of this:

removed mod by mod,nothig

updated GFX drivers,nothing

Raised,Lower all the setting's inside KSP again nothing

In a test save (sandbox) i tried to put as many parts into orbit (i thought at first that this is the cause) but nothing again everything was fine

it somehow has to do with a career save (although in my Career save i only have 1 craft in Orbit and a couple of flags)

and now i;am all out of ideas on what to do next, so if some one more experienced could take a look at the logs and suggest what to do next that would be great

Here are the logs,saves and a Screenshot of my Tech Tree progression

https://www.dropbox.com/s/0biy75653jdw3k4/KSPx32.rar?dl=0

i;am using

KSP 0.25 x32 (running in Opengl)

Windows 7 SP1 x64

Nvidia GTX670 2GB ram

16GB Ram on Mobo

i7 4770K 3.5 Ghz

MSI Z87 XPOWER

All the mod's in the list are 0.25 updated (except those few small part packs witch where not updated but are confirmed to work in 0.25)

thx to who ever takes the time to help out
